Item.comments: Increments the counter on a Community projecy
Item.method_code:
Dim id As String = Me.getID() Dim callframe As Item = Me.newitem("SQL","SQL PROCESS") callframe.setproperty("name","COMMUNITYPROJECT_DOWNLOAD_INCREMENT") callframe.setproperty("PROCESS","CALL") callframe.setproperty("ARG1", id) Dim resultframe As Item = callframe.apply() If resultframe.isError() Then Return(resultframe) End If
Dim result_text = resultframe.getproperty("result_text")
If result_text <> "SUCCESS" Then Return Me.newinnovator.newError("COMMUNITYPROJECT_DOWNLOAD_INCREMENT " + result_text) End If
Return Me.newinnovator.newResult(result_text)
Item.name: CP DOWNLOAD INCREMENT
